name: ALABAMA SHINE
text: This place is unprofessional in customer service and products are defective.  I don’t recommend them to anyone.   I called about a defective product and there so called team leader was not professional and I drove over 25 miles one way.  I know this is only store for these products but once out the door and u leave.   It’s yours So beware of what they recommend and google it first then save money order the product on eBay or Amazon

resp.text: We apologize that we didn't meet your expectations. We have thousands of different products and we try to only carry the best products available, but even the best products sometimes have issues. We will be happy to exchange the product for you or if you would like to discuss it further please feel free to call us and ask for the Director of Operations.

name: Oleta Bruner
text: Love it best in the state of alabama

name: David Goodwin
text: Great uniforms , custom badges , gun belts an accessorys , custom name tags etc,etc

resp.text: Thank you David. We are happy to have you as a customer!

name: Roland Vaughan
text: I Have been doing buisness with Mullins for the last 40 years with cugar company and my church. Good people

name: Jeff Beasley
text: I went by last Friday at 11:40.  They were closed.  Advertising said open til 12.    Called today at 11:30 the man said open til 1.  Arrived at 12 noon closed!!

name: pamela “pamelascot” lul
text: They put in all our fire safety equipment and the prices were decent.

name: T Ward
text: I had a great experience getting all my extinguishers serviced and certified

name: Aurelio de Mosqueda
text: I think is expensive because there's no competition around.

name: Patrick Wolf
text: J D is an excellent unloader

name: Michael Henderson
text: Good parts, good people behind counter. Sometimes they need a couple more people behind counter. But overall excellent.

name: Donna Lasseter
text: The staff is very friendly and helpful seems like a nice place to work

name: Lee Ober
text: Great place to pickup. Loaded quickly very friendly people!

name: W Wolfe
text: Easy to work with. Their yard is a little tight though.
